lines.text: Oh I feel the baby, the baby!
[deep voice]
Oh SHIT!
[Dr. Reddin has found out Alex is carrying her baby]

Why should I be upset! You lie to me. You... STEAL from me. You engage in a utterly selfish, IMMORAL, arrogant stunt without any regard for my feelings whatsoever. What am I supposed to be, grateful? This is just SO MALE!
What do you mean, what am I doing here? It's my baby, not yours!
Hey. I put it in there.
It's MY EGG!
Yeah, just 'cause your egg's in some guy doesn't make you the mother!
My body. *My* choice!
Do you have your own room?
Yes. Why?
Well, call me old-fashioned, but I'll be damned if I'm having a child with a man I've never even slept with.
I've noticed that the side effects of pregnancy are greatly amplified... With the dosage of Expectane that l've required. The morning sickness, the mood swings. Sleepiness, sexual appetite.
Sexual appetite?
Yesterday, just scooping the middle out of a honeydew melon gave me a - A "Steifen".
A what? Oh. That's normal. I get 'em all the time.
You think you're the first clown whoever woke up and said "I'm bored, I think I'll have a kid!"
[Dr. Hesse has to explain why he looks so 'masculine']
When I was a sportswoman on the East German Olympic Track and Field team, they dispensed anabolic steroids as freely as here in America they dole out Gator-Ade.
Let me shake hands with the man who would be Mom.
My nipples are very sensitive.

[to Diana]
Does my body disgust you?
I'm all woman.
